lead_story.headline: Full-Stack Developer Focused on Performance and User Experience
intro: Motivated and results-oriented Junior Web Developer and Software Engineer with a strong foundation in full-stack web development. Experienced as a solo developer building and maintaining responsive web applications using PHP, Laravel, and React.js.
Proven ability to deliver modern, user-centric solutions while managing IT infrastructure and providing technical support. Eager to leverage technical skills in a challenging development role.
lead_story.pull_quote: Bridging the gap between complex logic and seamless user experience through clean, efficient code.

projects.title: Customer Relationship Manager
projects.description: Comprehensive CRM system developed to streamline client data management, interaction tracking, and service history for better customer retention.

projects.title: Outside Plant Management System
projects.description: A GIS-based solution mapping and managing fiber optic infrastructure. Enabled detailed visualization and efficient network planning for ISP field operations.

projects.title: Project Management Prototype
projects.description: A decoupled project management system with a focus on scalability. Features separate codebases for the frontend and backend to separate concerns and improve maintainability.

projects.title: Classic Tetris Clone
projects.description: A faithful recreation of the classic puzzle game. Implements complex game logic, collision detection, and score tracking without external game engines.
